name: Spark Deep Dive
description: Reflective prompts for slower, thoughtful sessions.

cards.text: What experience shaped a core part of who you are?
Who is someone from your past you wish you could thank?
What tradition from your childhood would you keep forever?
What recent obstacle are you quietly proud of overcoming?
What do you tend to avoid that usually helps when you face it?
What is a skill you are rebuilding after a setback?
Which value guides your decisions when things get messy?
What belief have you changed your mind about recently?
Where do you draw the line between ambition and balance?
Who makes you feel most understood, and why?
When do you feel most connected to people around you?
What is a small gesture that signals care to you?
Offer one encouragement for the other player right now.
Share a photo or screenshot that captures your current season.
Each write down a word; reveal at the same time and connect them in a sentence.
